title: How Do I Level Up On the Forums?
body: I want to make a post concerning questions brought up due to the connections between Anivia, Voli, and Ornn involving the potential for VGUs and shared skin themes but I'm level 5 on here and I don't know whether I should have leveled with my actual LoL account or if there is some other system that I need to go through.

replies.body: Had to comment on the amazing name you have

Your boards account level is directly tied to your client Summoner level! Sometimes this side of the equation needs a little push to make sure it gets updated correctly with your Summoner level, and it looks like this post did the trick!
